title: How quickly can we treat covid-19?
description:
The scientific community is moving at unprecedented speed to develop a way to treat COVID-19. But how soon can a treatment or a vaccine be available to the public?

Featuring
@mslopatto

Links to resources discussed:
https://www.vox.com/2020/3/11/21163262/is-there-a-cure-for-coronavirus

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:
Newsletter: Recode Daily 
Twitter: @Recode
